General.Name: Ormonde Mining PLC
General.Description: Ormonde Mining plc engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral resource projects in Ireland and Spain. It holds interest in the Salamanca and Zamora Gold projects consisting of 48% interests in two investigation permits in Salamanca province consisting of 69 square kilometers and 44% interests in two investigation permits in Zamora province consisting of approximately 37 square kilometers located in Spain. The company was formerly known as Burmin Exploration and Development plc and changed its name to Ormonde Mining plc in August 1995. Ormonde Mining plc was incorporated in 1983 and is headquartered in Clonee, Ireland.
General.Address: Bracetown Business Park, Clonee, Ireland, D15 YN2P
